mapper.insert: insert into coupon (COUPON_NM, COUPON_CNTNTS, COUPON_DSCNT, COUPON_BEGIN_DE, COUPON_END_DE) values (#{coupon_nm}, #{coupon_cntnts}, #{coupon_begin_de}, #{coupon_end_de})
insert into coupon_goods_creation (COUPON_CODE, GOODS_CODE, COUPON_CO, BHF_CODE) values (#{coupon_code}, #{goods_code}, #{coupon_co}, #{bhf_code})
mapper.select: select c.coupon_code, c.coupon_nm, c.coupon_cntnts, c.coupon_dscnt, c.coupon_begin_de, c.coupon_end_de, g.bhf_code from coupon c, coupon_goods_creation g where c.coupon_code = g.coupon_code AND g.bhf_code = #{bhf_code} OR g.bhf_code = 0
select MAX(coupon_code) as max_code from coupon
